thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Gary Larbes
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Gary Larbes

author: Gary Larbes
title: Gary Larbes
text:
I have been buying from Banggood.com for several months and I must say that they take care of their customers. Metal took care of an order for me that needed to be canceled. It was taken care of promptly. I have nothing to say about Banggood but good things. Great place to shop, great customer service and prices that can't be beat.
Thank You
Gary
